package.name: NFLThemeh20net
package.shortDescription: American Football NFL Theme by u/h20net

descriptionlist.description: American Football NFL Theme by u/h20net

An American Football NFL Theme containing 40 icons. This includes all the default applications of ios 11 +

-unc0ver (jailbreak application)
-Cydia
-Sileo
-iCleaner Pro
-Twitter
-Facebook
-Youtube
-Twitch
-Reddit
-Fox News
-Snapchat
The theme is tested on ios 11 with SnowBoard but is expected to work with Anemone as well.
I will add more if I find more copyright free NFL themed icons. If you experience any problems please contact me!
